title: Title
----
username: Username
----
password: Password
----
register: Register
----
login: Login
----
logout: Logout
----
user: User
----
not_logged_in: Not logged in
----
logged_out_message: You are now logged out
----
not_logged_out_message: You are **not** yet logged out
----
you_are_already_logged_in: You are already logged in. Would you like to <a class='badge badge-primary badge-sm' href='../vendor/centicms_user/logout.php'>Log out</a> ?
----
username_not_recognized: The username '{{session.wrong_username}}' is not recognized. Please, <a class='badge badge-primary badge-sm' href='register'>Register</a> first.
----
username_already_taken: Someone else is already registered with username '{{session.wrong_username}}'
----
you_are_registered: You are successfully registered as '{{session.username}}' and already logged in
----
were_logged_out: You were already logged out
----
are_logged_out: You are now logged out
----
or: or
